title: Suddenly my Pixel 3 has stopped working playing music over Bluetooth with Sony headphones
content:
I have tried restarting both devices. I have forgotten the device and repaired. The device is connected but no music or anything - I have tried multiple apps to play media.

I have ensured the audio is playing through Bluetooth and also media ability is switched on in Bluetooth setting for the device. I have ensured the volume is up.

The Bluetooth headphones with my iPad so I know it's not a problem with them.

It was working fine last week - now suddently not.
